column3: Nelson is a great gentleman.  I met him at the Worlds in 1991, Stuttgart, as well as at a Six Day race.
Wonder if Nelson remembers racing at the Silverdome (Tasmania, Australia) back in the 80s, and signing an autograph for a star-struck kid in the infield.
THANKU!!! I met Nelson Vales at the Bike Expo NYC and at a GranFondo NYC!!! 22mai21
I wonder who actually disliked this video and why? I can think of a couple of reasons, why they disliked it...

Got to ride with the Cheetah last year. It was my very first group ride. Told him I was slow going up the hills, he told me he was too. Very encouraging. Got to interview him on my podcast. Truly a history making gem.

I met Nelson in 2018, I remember watching him in the olympics and I was excited to speak with him.  What a wonderful person
Great to meet Nelson recently at Rapha DC, a great gentleman! Ride on Nelson!!
